DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Error_libWrapper_Missing: DF Manual Rolls requires the 'libWrapper' module. Please install and activate it.

Settings.GM_Hint: Manual Roll setting for all GM roles.
Settings.PC_Hint: Default Manual Roll setting for all PC roles. This is overridden by the setting in the player config.
Settings.Flagged_Hint: Add a flag to chat rolls that use manual dice.
Settings.FocusInput_Hint: If enabled, will set the focus to the first input field in the roll request window.

DF_MANUAL_ROLLS.Reload_Content: You changed the forced manual rolls setting which needs the page to be reloaded.

Prompt.Legacy: Please enter a {0}d{1} roll from {0} to {2}

Tooltip.RollTerm: The Dice Term in the roll being requested.
Tooltip.Rolls: Roll result for each individual requested roll.
Tooltip.Total: Total value of combined dice to avoid entering the value for each die.
